title: Checking In At NBA Camps - Who Knows Their Roles?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk Embiid’s comfort coming into the season, lingering issues with the Suns following last year’s collapse and what the potential looks like in Minnesota. Plus, will the fans get the play time they want for young talent in New York?

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Does Ayton Like His Role With The Suns? Potential for Minnesota?
